column4: are you hackintoshing?  or you have that triple boot on a mac?
shhh!  (yes i've a triple booted Dell hackintosh.  BUT I spend most time in ubuntu.)
hehe.  its all good.  i was just wondering if you are using bootcamp.  I guess not..
a lot of arty types run there macs all around me, but i've yet to see one dual/running ubuntu.
